title: Mary and Max: The Exhibition: interview with Adam Elliot March 2010

video_links.name: Mary and Max: The Exhibition: interview with Adam Elliot March 2010

brief_description: Oscar winning animation director and writer Adam Elliot speaks candidly about his stop frame animation processes and, more importantly, about why he makes films. Adam also talks about the challenges he faced during the making of his first feature film ‘Mary and Max’.
title_for_label: Mary and Max: The Exhibition: interview with Adam Elliot March 2010
